title: Brigit requires supported bank account with 90-day transaction history
statement: Users must have a checking account with Brigit's supported banks that allows third-party data aggregators to view 90 days of transactions.

citations.quote: You must have a checking account with one of our supported banks or credit unions (a "Bank Account"); and Your Bank Account must enable our third-party data aggregators to view your transactions for the last ninety (90) days.
